job_title: Printing & Postal Services Manager in Fort Wayne, IN
pros: Everyone is very nice and fun! It's a great Christian environment.
cons: Limited career opportunities for women, just because of the nature of the institution.

pros: The campus is beautiful and peaceful.  It is historic and sits on a large plot of land and even has a lake.
cons: The place is so chaotic that it is hard to describe.  The mindset seems to be that since they are doing God's work, no one has to have a clue what anyone else is doing or communicate to anyone else what is being done.  I worked here for nearly a year, and never did really know what what expected of me or how to accomplish the few tasks I could figure out.  Rarely did I find a staff member who seemed to care in the least about me as a person.
